column1: * 1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Edmund R. Meskys (2 February 1972)
* 2006 - Previews of The Lord of the Rings Musical open in Toronto.
* 2007 - The Lord of the Rings: The White Council is put on permanent hiatus delay
column2: the video-game would later be cancelled. The Lord of the Rings: Conquest was released instead.
